description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. You are the cootie crusher!  People come to you to resolve their cootie infestations.  Crush those little bugs as quickly as you can.  You get bonuses for speed and accuracy.
description.short: You are the cootie crusher!  People come to you to resolve their cootie infestations.  Crush those little bugs as quickly as you can.  You get bonuses for speed and accuracy.
